meanings.sent1: The soup had a waterish taste.
meanings.sent2: The raincoat felt waterish to the touch.
meanings.sent3: The waterish tea made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes had a waterish clarity.
meanings.sent5: The lake looked incredibly waterish under the moonlight.

meanings.definition: Having the qualities or properties of water.
meanings.sent1: The jellyfish had a waterish texture.
meanings.sent2: The sponge became waterish when wet.
meanings.sent3: The waterish soap bubbled up in a funny way.
meanings.sent4: His voice had a waterish fluidity.
meanings.sent5: The clouds formed a waterish pattern in the sky.
